definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
to ambush/to lie in wait for/to lie low/ambush
to immerse oneself in/engrossed in sth/to lower the head (e.g. to avoid rain)/countersunk (of screws, rivets etc)
Ambush from Ten Sides (pipa solo piece)/House of Flying Daggers (2004 movie by Zhang Yimou 張藝謀|张艺谋[Zhang1 Yi4 mou2])
to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work/to make an all-out effort/up to the neck in work
to engulf/to bury/to overlook/to stifle/to neglect/to fall into oblivion
to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground
to immerse oneself in (one's work, studies etc)
to lie in wait/to ambush/to conceal sth

sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是淺埋岩溶區常見的一種地質災害。

sentences.english: Daisy took her face in her hands as if feeling its lovely shape.
sentences.chinese: 黛西把她的臉埋在手中，好象在感覺那嬌好的輪廓。

sentences.english: Ida buried the flowers with her cousins.
sentences.chinese: 意達和她的表兄妹們把花埋了。

sentences.english: Do they always bury it as deep as this?
sentences.chinese: 他們總是埋得這樣深嗎？

sentences.english: Rescuers worked after daybreak to try to reach those trapped in the rubble of collapsed buildings.
sentences.chinese: 救援人員拂曉開始搜尋被埋在倒坍建築物瓦礫中的人。

sentences.english: For ten years, he led his men in the search for the buried gold.
sentences.chinese: 他帶領手下人，花了十年時間在尋找埋在地下的金子。

sentences.english: They are killing older people now in Prussia, they buried them up in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 在普拉斯左營，他們正殺害老人，然後埋在森林裏。

sentences.english: They returned in turn to bury the luxuries burnt in the burst.
sentences.chinese: 他們順次返返來埋躲在爆炸中銷燬的豪侈品。

sentences.english: He was buried in the floor of the Mission San Carlos Church.
sentences.chinese: 他在該特派團聖卡洛斯教堂地板埋所有總部。

sentences.english: With metastasis of both sides, the catheter was inserted into the main trunk of pulmonary artery.
sentences.chinese: 兩側轉移竈者，導管頭端埋於肺總動脈處。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new type of control circuit of SAW.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種新型的埋弧自動焊接機的控制電路。

sentences.english: Teachellong them not to be afraid of the water, I put my face in the water and blew bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓他們不憚水，我把臉埋在水裏吹泡泡。

sentences.english: If I passed away quietly someday, please bury me in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 如果有一天，我悄然離去，請把我埋在這春天裏。

sentences.english: He is buried in Rochester, New York.
sentences.chinese: 他被埋在紐約的羅切斯特市。

sentences.english: At other times this hairy man squatted by the fire with head between his legs and slept.
sentences.chinese: 有時這毛人將頭埋在兩腿之間，蹲在火邊睡覺。

sentences.english: If you dare, I dare to bury.

definition: to dig into/to cut a mine into
carpenter's plane/to plane (woodwork)/to shave off/to peel (with a potato peeler etc)
to dig/to excavate/(coll.) to exclude/not to count/to deduct/to subtract
to pry open or apart/to spread (sth) open with both hands
